## Description {#details}

This class acts as the glue that joins the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combinerhelper">CombinerHelper</a> to the overall Combine algorithm.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combinerhelper">CombinerHelper</a> is intended to report the modifications it makes to the MIR to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselchangeobserver">GISelChangeObserver</a> and the observer subclass will act on these events.

Definition at line 52 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/combiner-cpp">Combiner.cpp</a>.

The instructions that have been created but we want to report once they have their operands.

This is only maintained if debug output is requested.
